products.name: Corn
products.description: Fresh and organic corn, harvested directly from the farm. Ideal for cooking or as a healthy snack.

products.name: Red Capsicum
products.description: Crisp and vibrant red capsicums, perfect for salads, stir-fries, or grilling.

products.name: Blue-Berry
products.description: Plump and sweet blueberries, packed with antioxidants for a healthy boost.

products.name: Pumpkin
products.description: Rich and hearty pumpkins, excellent for soups, pies, or roasting.

products.name: Brinjal
products.description: Fresh brinjal, also known as eggplant, great for grilling, roasting, or curries.

products.name: Cabbage
products.description: Crunchy cabbage, ideal for slaws, salads, or cooking in a variety of dishes.

products.name: Red Kidney Beans
products.description: Nutritious and protein-rich red kidney beans, perfect for curries or salads.

products.name: Red Tomato
products.description: Juicy and ripe red tomatoes, great for sauces, salads, and sandwiches.

products.name: Carrot
products.description: Sweet and crunchy carrots, ideal for salads, snacks, or cooking.

products.name: Wheat (Dal)
products.description: Whole wheat dal, great for making traditional Indian dishes like chapati and dal.

products.name: Cucumber
products.description: Fresh cucumbers, perfect for salads, sandwiches, or cooling snacks.

products.name: Yellow Split Peas (Toor Dal)
products.description: Nutritious yellow split peas, also known as toor dal, a staple in Indian cuisine.
